articles.title: 5 free agents that might make the most sense for Patriots to pursue at positions of need
articles.description:
The Patriots are set to have roughly $41 million in cap space this offseason.

The post 5 free agents that might make the most sense for Patriots to pursue at positions of need appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Patriots have approximately $41 million in cap space for offseason moves.
Potential free agents could address key positions of need for the team.
Improved roster could enhance Patriots' competitiveness in the upcoming season.
